required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Inner and Middle Ear Effects of Hyperbaric Oxygen Thrapy
clinical_study.official_title: Inner and Middle Ear Effects of Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: Audiological evaluation performed to patients on hyperbaric oxygen therapy to see its effects on middle ear pressure

detailed_description.textblock: Thirty patients will be recruited from center pf hyperbaric oxygen therapy Every patient who received HBOT was submitted for Demographic data:age,gender,condition raquiring HBOT,use of analgesics,history of diabets ,cardiovascular or respiratory disease ,psychatric illness,smoking history facial/ENT problems and previous HBOT problems then tympanometry and basic pure tone audiometry including air and bone conduction is done following each of the first five treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through completion of study after 2 years
primary_outcome.description: Measuring middle ear pressure before exposure ro hyperbaric oxygen and following each of the first five treatments

arm_group.description: Patients already recieving hyperbaric oxygen therapy for treatment of other medical conditions requiring it as in diabetic foot , cerebral infarctions

intervention.description: Patients already on treatment by hyperbaric oxygen therapy for medical conditions requiring treatment by it

study_pop.textblock: Measument of middle ear pressure after exposure to hyper baric oxygen therapy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients above 18 years old already recieving hyperbaric oxygen therapy for treatment of other medical conditions required treatment by it as in diabetic foot
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients who already had tympanostomy tubes

results_reference.citation: Yamamoto Y, Noguchi Y, Enomoto M, Yagishita K, Kitamura K. Otological complications associated with hyperbaric oxygen therapy. Eur Arch Otorhinolaryngol. 2016 Sep;273(9):2487-93. doi: 10.1007/s00405-015-3845-9. Epub 2015 Dec 9.
